subject: Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Benat Intxausti, whose powerful attack in Monday’s hill stage had given him the overall lead, raced home safely in the peloton to win the Tour of Beijing.
snippet: Benat Intxausti, whose powerful attack in Monday’s hill stage had given him the overall lead, raced home safely in the peloton to win the Tour of Beijing.
